scripts.release:patch: yarn build && yarn release --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin main && yarn npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && yarn release --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main && yarn npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: yarn build && yarn release --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin main && yarn npm publish --access public
